duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide language interpretation services between patients, families, and healthcare team to ensure comprehension of cultural considerations during treatment planning.

Concurrently perform bilingual interpretation (English and foreign language) of patient care needs between patient, family, and health care team members to ensure understanding of needs, issues, and/or concerns.
Maintain accurate and timely documentation of interpretation activities.
Participate in department and/or hospital sponsored educational programs to maintain skills and competencies.
Work closely with Translators to identify documents, materials, and other written information requiring translation, including consents and discharge information.
Refer identified psychosocial issues to appropriate departments to ensure an effective response to patient/family needs.
Perform miscellaneous job-related duties as requested.

education_certification.credential: Completion of a medical interpreter training course that is consistent with national standards.
Completion of Spanish Bilingual Assistant or equivalent training
